div.div: Beloit College vs. Univ. of Chicago

tr.td: Chicago wins toss, defers. Beloit receives in south end zone.
Cheaney,Ben kickoff 65 yards to the BC0, Luke Versulien return 4 yards to the BC4 (Team).
Raymond Thomas rush for 1 yard to the BC5 (Ross,Nick).
Dillon Hess pass complete to Eddie Boyd for 3 yards to the BC8 (Connell,W).
Dillon Hess pass incomplete to Raymond Thomas, QB hurry by Bolock,Brandon.
Dillon Hess punt 30 yards to the BC38, downed.
